card_text: This Defense Position card cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gouki Guts" once per turn.$N●During your Main Phase: You can make all "Gouki" monsters you control gain 200 ATK.$N●If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Gouki" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Gouki Guts".
